GuardiCore | (Senior) Software Developer | Tel Aviv, Israel | ONSITE, Full Time

We develop a unique security product for large data centers, which does best of class breach detection, network visibility and micro segmentation.

Come work with a growing team of bright developers, and solve hard problems on a day to day basis.

If this interests you - contact me at yuri@guardicore.com or visit our careers page https://www.guardicore.com/company/careers/
